pages.text: Molten blocks look like magma blocks. They arenâ€™t used a whole lot, but there are a few types of molten blocks that you can play around with. I typically use molten blocks while making caves. The new molten blocks are stone, granite, diorite, andesite, sandstone, smooth sandstone, red sandstone, smooth red sandstone, obsidian, blackstone and basalt.
